summary: Dr. Serena R. Nolan's medical license was suspended by consent order due to findings of unprofessional conduct, professional and physical/mental incompetence, and failure to meet standards in quality medical care. Allegations included excessive opioid prescribing and issues with her own medication use, including self-prescribing. She is ordered to enroll in and comply with the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program as a condition for potential future termination of her suspension.
